issue.title: VMWare throwing an error when launching gazebo

content.raw:
If it helps, here is the dmesg log for a gazebo crash with OpenGL 3.3 under VMWare:

```
#!bash

[67114.175015] [drm:vmw_view_bindings_add [vmwgfx]] *ERROR* View not found.
[67114.175023] [drm:vmw_execbuf_process [vmwgfx]] *ERROR* Invalid SVGA3D command: 1161
```

The error occurs on [this line](https://github.com/torvalds/linux/blob/master/drivers/gpu/drm/vmwgfx/vmwgfx_execbuf.c#L922) of the vmgfx driver. The SVGA command 1161 corresponds to ```SVGA_3D_CMD_DX_SET_RENDERTARGETS```. I can confirm that neither of these two errors appear in dmesg with ```SVGA_VGPU10=0```.
